entry.title: Wednesday night: Showers at times heavy or thunderstorms. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Showers at times heavy ending after midnight then partly cloudy. A few thunderstorms early this evening. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Wind becoming west 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
